thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 19 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-SHW Beteiligungs GmbH: Voluntary Purchase Offer To Shareholders Of SHW AG

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-SHW Beteiligungs GmbH: Voluntary Purchase Offer To Shareholders Of SHW AG
text:
Feb 19 (Reuters) - SHW Beteiligungs GmbH:
* ANNOUNCES VOLUNTARY PURCHASE OFFER TO SHAREHOLDERS OF SHW AG
* SHW - SHW BETEILIGUNGS TO PROPOSE TO SHAREHOLDERS OF SHW AG PURCHASE OF UP TO 1,655,540 SHARES (APPROX. 25.72% OF SHARE CAPITAL)
* SHW BETEILIGUNGS GMBH SAYS OFFER PRICE: EUR 35.00 PER SHARE
* SHW BETEILIGUNGS GMBH SAYS TRANSACTION AIMS AT STRATEGIC INCREASE OF EXISTING INVESTMENT FROM 49.38% UP TO 75.1% Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
